message: This offer gives you a quarter of the money upfront, Bob.  Let's not risk it decreasing with inflation!
This offer is fair and keeps us both close to the original value of the money. Let's end this before inflation eats away at our profits!
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, but inflation hurts you more than me.  This offer still gives you a decent share, and it's better than risking further losses!
Alice, we're both losing money with each round. Let's split it evenly and end this before it's too late. It's the fairest option now.
